name: Gajar Qalaqand Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Gajar Qalaqand Recipe: Carrot grated ½ kg Sugar 1cup Khoya ½ kg Screw pine essence 1tsp Cardamom grounded ½ tsp Silver paper for garnishing Almonds as required Pistachio as required
instructions: In a pan add carrots and cook on low flame till water dries Now add sugar and cook on high flame then turn off the flame Now add cardamom , khoya and screw pine water Now place this mixture in grease tray and add qalaqand Than garnish with almonds , pistachios , and silver paper .
